Name: How To Bathe Your Cat: Impossible Mission
About the game: Gameplay You will have to use itens to destroy the ground to make a fluid reach the cat. Drill: Blower: Rocket: Grappling hook: After the cat is clean you need to perfume him: Be careful with the lava: Features Bathe the cat using your logical thinking and physic intuition. Use itens to destroy the ground to make a fluid reach the cat. Experience several kind of fluids with different mechanics (Water, Lava, Gas). Jump in the scenario and use a grappling hook to reach difficult places. 40 unique handmade levels. 4 beautiful scenarios.
